com.netflix.spectator.api

Class ConstantTagFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.api.ConstantTagFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagFactory
    Deprecated. 
    Use spectator-ext-placeholders library instead.

    @Deprecated
public final class ConstantTagFactory
extends Object
implements TagFactory
    TagFactory implementation that always produces the same tag. Useful for providing a default value for a tag.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConstantTagFactory(String key, String value)

      Construct a new instance that will always return a Tag with the specified value.

      Deprecated. 
      Construct a new instance that will always return the specified tag.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tag createTag()
      Deprecated. 
      Produces a tag based on the runtime context available to the factory.
      String name()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the name of the factory, which is used as the key for any Tag produced by the createTag method.
